anomalyDetection.name: AWS/Engineering Policy
anomalyDetection.description: Daily expenses must not exceed the average amount for the last 4 days by 10%

anomalyDetection.name: Instance Count
anomalyDetection.description: Daily expenses must not exceed the average amount for the last 7 days by 20%

anomalyDetection.name: Marketing Expenses
anomalyDetection.description: Daily expenses must not exceed the average amount for the last 30 days by 10%
